A collider doesn’t need to be exactly the same shape as the object’s mesh - a rough approximation is often more efficient and indistinguishable in gameplay. More info See in Glossary 2D. Page Description Composite Collider 2D component reference Refer to the Composite Collider 2D properties to merge other collider shapes into a single collider.
